price: ߤߍ߲߬ ߊߟߎ߬ ߒ ߠߊ߫ ߖߐ߲߭ ߠߎ߬ ߸ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߕߍ߫ ߊߟߎ ߟߊ߫ ߓߌ߬ ، ߊߟߎ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍߣߊ߫ ߛߎ߬ߣߎ߲߬ ߠߊ߫
arabic: يَٰعِبَادِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ تَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yāʿibādi lā khawfun ʿalaykumu al-yawma walā antum taḥzanūna
